lyric:
[by:本维笑]
[00:00.00]双笙：We don't talk anymore
[00:01.94]囧菌：We don't talk anymore
[00:04.44]合：We don't talk anymore
[00:06.72]Like we used to do
[00:09.79]囧菌：We don't love anymore
[00:11.77]双笙：What was all of it for
[00:14.25]合：Oh we don't talk anymore
[00:16.43]Like we used to do
[00:19.19]囧菌：I just heard you found the one you've been lookin'
[00:24.11]You've been lookin' for
[00:25.41]I wish I would have known that wasn't me
[00:29.30]Cuz even after all this time I still wonder
[00:32.33]Why I can't move on
[00:34.56]Just the way you did so easily
[00:39.70]双笙：Don't wanna know
[00:41.49]What kinda dress you're wearin' tonight
[00:43.34]If he's holdin' onto you so tight
[00:45.45]The way I did before
[00:48.11]囧菌：I overdosed
[00:49.89]Should've known your love was a game
[00:51.71]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[00:55.60]Oh it's such a shame
[00:57.73]We don't talk anymore

[01:13.79]Like we used to do
[01:17.80]双笙：I just hope you're lyin' next to somebody
[01:20.10]Who knows how to love you like me
[01:22.81]There must be a good reason that you're gone
[01:26.55]Every now and then I think you
[01:29.31]Might want me to come show up at your door
[01:32.38]But I'm just too afraid that I'll be wrong
[01:36.58]囧菌：Don't wanna know
[01:38.29]If you're lookin' into her eyes
[01:40.82]If she's holdin' onto you so tight
[01:43.15]The way I did before
[01:46.59]双笙：I overdosed
[01:47.73]Should've known your love was a game
[01:50.27]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[01:52.66]Oh it's such a shame

[02:09.66]Oh we don't talk anymore
[02:11.62]Like we used to do
[02:21.24]囧菌：Like we used to do
[02:32.76]双笙：Don't wanna know
[02:35.74]What kinda dress you're wearin' tonight
[02:38.14]If he's givin' it to you just right
[02:40.54]The way I did before
[02:43.28]囧菌：I overdosed
[02:45.28]Should've known your love was a game
[02:47.68]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[02:50.23]合：Oh it's such a shame
[02:53.19]We don't talk anymore
[02:55.90]We don't talk anymore

[03:02.51]We don't love anymore
[03:04.50]What was all of it for
[03:06.95]Oh we don't talk anymore
[03:09.28]Like we used to do
[03:11.91]双笙：We don't talk anymore
[03:13.97]囧菌：What kinda dress you're wearin' tonight
[03:16.27]双笙：Oh
[03:16.74]囧菌：If he's holdin' onto you so tight
[03:18.49]双笙：Oh
[03:18.80]双笙：The way I did before

tlyric:
[by:痕羽流觞i]
[00:00.00]我们之间只剩无边的沉默.
[00:01.94]只剩无边的沉默.
[00:04.44]只剩沉默.
[00:06.72]再也回不到从前的耳语亲昵.
[00:09.79]爱也在这样的沉默里消耗殆尽.
[00:11.77]这一切究竟是何原因.
[00:14.25]一切都被沉默代替.
[00:16.43]无话不说的从前已成回忆.
[00:19.19]听闻你已找到心仪的他.
[00:24.11]而他也如你所愿的爱你.
[00:25.41]真希望我能早点明白你要的不是我.
[00:29.30]分开了那么久我却不知为何.
[00:32.33]还迟迟不肯释怀不肯放手.
[00:34.56]而你却那么轻易的说走就走.
[00:39.70]不想去想.
[00:41.49]今夜的你会为他怎样精心打扮自己.
[00:43.34]也不想去想他会否如我从前那般.
[00:45.45]将你紧拥在怀里.
[00:48.11]我还沉浸于过去久久不能平息.
[00:49.89]早该明白你我之间不过游戏.
[00:51.71]那样也不至于让我至今都忘不了你.
[00:55.60]真让我无言又无奈.
[00:57.73]我们之间只剩无边的沉默.
[00:59.67]只剩无边的沉默.
[01:02.22]只剩沉默.
[01:04.90]再也回不到从前的耳语亲昵.

[01:09.35]这一切究竟是何原因.

[01:13.79]无话不说的从前已成回忆.
[01:17.80]希望此时的你正轻靠在某个温暖的怀抱里.
[01:20.10]希望他也能像我那般懂得爱你.
[01:22.81]那我也能以此为由安慰自己说你离开我也会幸福开心.
[01:26.55]当我每次想起你.
[01:29.31]都会希望能重回到在你楼下等你的场景.
[01:32.38]但也许我也只是自己骗自己.
[01:36.58]不想去想.
[01:38.29]此时的他是否正深情的凝望着你的眼睛.
[01:40.82]也不想去想他会否将你紧拥在怀里.

[01:50.27]那样也不至于让我至今都忘不了你.
[01:52.66]真让我无言又无奈.

[01:57.71]只剩无边的沉默.
[02:00.17]只剩沉默.
[02:01.78]再也回不到从前的耳语亲昵.
